entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
